channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft RMS Sharing for Mac

item.title: CVE-2020-1019|2024-08-04T06:25:00.728Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20rms%20sharing%20for%20mac
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in RMS Sharing App for Mac in the way it allows an attacker to load unsigned binaries, aka 'Microsoft RMS Sharing App for Mac Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.
